Reviews.Title: “the cleanest, friendliest family owned & operated motel for your dollar!”
Reviews.Author: ohtanone
Reviews.Content: this was a yearly vacation for my husband & myself. we stayed here for 6 wks. we have been going back to the Link for 27 years for our winter get-a-way!! the family at the motel has become our second family! the accomendations there are excellent and they go above & beyond to make your stay there the best! we recomend the golden link to ALL our family & friends! their is not another motel in Florida that does more for their guests! wonderful location on a beautiful lake close to all the parks & adventures! the heated pool is wonderful!! we definately recomend the Golden Link Motel!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Quiet & Affordable!!!”
Reviews.Author: Bevzvet
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at the Golden Link Motel. When several hotels turned us away because we were only staying one night on March 17, 2012 or they had no vacancies, we called The Golden Link. They had several rooms available. We stayed in a room with two double beds, TV, fridge, microwave for $49/night. No price gauging here, as at the Hampton Inn, I95 in St Augustine( who wanted to charge us $189 for a room that lists online for $89 for seniors.) The gal at the front desk was friendly and accomodating. The pool, room & grounds were spotless with ample free parking near your room. There were plenty of restaurants and activities within walking distance. We will stay here again when in the area...

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: sussexray
Reviews.Content: Stopped for 7 nights in Feb 2012.Rooms large and comfortable.Remember this is a rather old motel.Continetal breakfast is and I stress very simple. Coffee was more often cold .Staff all very helpful.You could drink your coffee overlooking the lake and this was a nice start to the day.Pool was heated and I enjoyed this.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value & Great Location”
Reviews.Author: riga21
Reviews.Content: Stayed here twice last year in March & Nov, great experience both times. We found this place on TripAdvisor from the reviews, if you’re looking for a place that’s close to the theme parks, good value, safe, clean, this is your place. We were away all day at the parks, all we wanted was to come back to, was a clean room with air conditioning, and that we did. If you’re looking for a bellhop and room service, go else where to the big chains. The staff (Sheila) works hard, and will answer any of your questions or concerns. We hope to return soon, as there is so much to see and do in sunny Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Rosemary419
Reviews.Content: We decided to spend the night here based on the reviews I've read. We're not disappointed. I can only repeat about every great comment that's been made about this motel. If we ever come back through Kissimmee again, we will be staying here. I will definitely recommend this motel to anyone who will be in this area. In response to someones previous comment, we love American owned!

Reviews.Title: “Our home away from home”
Reviews.Author: EoCM
Reviews.Content: We come back year after year to this Great Motel in Kissimmee and we will continue returning here. The rooms are as always very clean and comfortable with a fridge and microwave, the pool is heated and always very nice and the barbeque area in the back facing Lake Cecile is really nice. The location is also one of the perfect things about this place, lot's of restaurants within walking distance, traffic light intersection which makes it very easy to get to where you want to go with your car. The owner Monica and all of her staff is amazing, they really make you feel like home and there is always a smile on their faces. As you understand we can really recommend this Motel to anyone planning a visit in the Kissimmee / Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Clean Motel”
Reviews.Author: ranger058
Reviews.Content: Very Clean Motel rooms nice size , all the staff are very helpful and friendly they help you when ever they can. Swimming Pool heated . Stayed here alot excellent value for money. Nice and centeral on the 192 easy access to all amenties.

Reviews.Title: “Golden Link is fantastic”
Reviews.Author: FoodWriter101
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Golden Link last week of NOV, 2011. The staff is excellent. The rooms are very clean and well furnished for comfort. The price is as exceptional as the motel. Many of the guest are return guests-turned friends due to the comfort and hospitality of this motel's staff. What ever you need, they are right there. The pool, which appears so clean it looks new, is heated to a wonderful 80+ degrees. After a day of walking it was a soooo refreshing for the sore legs and back.. I've been staying here since 1987, and will continue.

Reviews.Title: “It doesn't have a heated pool...they lie.”
Reviews.Author: UofLtraveler
Reviews.Content: I mean it's a motel. What can I say? I stayed here several years ago for a little too long. No frills. You get a roof and electricity. It has a good location. The pool isn't heated, though. It's not really clean but it doesn't have roaches that I could see. Doesn't mean they aren't there though.

Reviews.Title: “Great Disney Choice”
Reviews.Author: Stephen K
Reviews.Content: If you are planning to go to the Disney Parks, this hotel is a great choice. It offers a far better value than the big chains. Location is excellent and less than ten minutes from Disney on a very straight route. Prices are excellent, rooms are clean, grounds are pretty and the staff is great. There are lots of good inexpensive restaurants in walking distance ( my favorite is Smoky Bones right across the street). Doesn't really lend itself to spending a day hanging around like some of the fancier resorts, but any Disney visitor spends most of the time in the Parks anyway. This is a great place to come back to or an easy place to take a mid afternoon break. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a great value and convenience.

Reviews.Title: “Place to be in Kissimmee”
Reviews.Author: dai44
Reviews.Content: My wife an I have visited Orlando many times and although only staying at the GOLDEN LINK MOTEL for a day or two before moving on for our travels in Florida, we have ALWAYS had a great welcome from Monica, Shiela and Julie . The rooms and facilities are very good and are excellent value. The motel is situated in a very convienient location not only for the theme parks but is only minutes away from the restaurants and shops on Highway 192. Try the buffet breakfast at the Golden Coral close by and visit the OLD TOWN on a Friday or Saturday night to see the classic cars and bikes .Stay here once......you WILL come back again and again. Dianne and Dave LONDON UK

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Helen B
Reviews.Content: I have been staying here for years and I am always welcomed by the staff. You can't beat the price and the complimentary coffee and treats. My room is always clean and the pool is nice and warm. I recommend this place to all my friends as we always enjoy our stay here. We come twice a yr to the same place and always get treated with respect and dignity. This is the type of place families can afford to come and can still visit the parks as they are very close to all the fun of florida. Love the staff here they make you feel like you are at home! Where i come from the price we would pay for a place like this would be over $100.00 per night. Not many places like this anymore! Enjoyed our stay again. Thank You Golden Link Staff! Your the best!

Reviews.Title: “"American Owned" Lol....Lol...”
Reviews.Author: MrAmericano
Reviews.Content: This motel is very racist and they have very dated rooms with mold issues. Beware of this dump that is false advertising "American Owned"

Reviews.Title: “fab”
Reviews.Author: leanne f
Reviews.Content: i could not believe my eyes when i saw that this motel was still open i stayed here for 5 yrs in a row when i was growing up and really loved it such a lovely place to stay so close to everything and i loved the fact that i could take my kids there and show them the place that always talked about 2 them would not hesitate 2 stay there again

Reviews.Title: “Can't beat this place for the price!”
Reviews.Author: vjb333
Reviews.Content: Took a side trip during our Daytona Beach visit and we were sorry we only had one night here. The pool was warm and inviting, staff and guests were very friendly. Imagine our shock when we saw the free coffee and pastries in the morning. How do they do it for such a low price? Plan on the AC being a bit loud, but that worked for us; I didn't have to worry about making minor noise while my sister slept because "white noise" sound of the ac.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, friendly, warm pool, family oriented, and inexpensive”
Reviews.Author: 2boysmom1964
Reviews.Content: My hair stylist told me about this place and she was right. We will be back. This is where we will stay whenever we come to Disney. It is a great low rate hotel. It has some vintage appeal, everything is clean, and the pool is warm and clean. The other guests were friendly. The front desk people were kind and helped me find my cell phone at 11pm. We had a minor issue with the room that was fixed right away by a really cool repair guy who had been on the SWAT team in Kissimee. My kids were very impressed and will probably behave better, knowing he is around. (bwahahaha!) There is is Publix across the street and there is a charcoal grill in the back and comfortable chairs to sit in and look at the lake.

Reviews.Title: “CGV - Clean, Good Value”
Reviews.Author: gstabc
Reviews.Content: Arrived at motel after a three hour ride. Welcoming customer service yet they did not recognize me by name. After identifying myself by the type reservation made, everything went smoothly. The room was clean and comforting. Although the furniture is outdated, it served it’s purpose well. Of concern were the chairs in the room. They were a bit wobbly. To be truthful, I am not built like Tinkerbell but most of us are not. It would be good that the management update the furniture where needed. We had the handicap room 3xx – non-smoking/king. While it offered an updated toilet – the shower was not a toll in, just a tub and shower with bars. A wheelchair may find a tight squeeze in some places. The refrigerator and microwave were in good working order. Remember to plug in the refrigerator as soon as you arrive. It appears as if they disconnect to save electricity. Did not do breakfast – yet I did notice that the breakfast of choice are the “Little Debbie” snack cakes and that is all. Did not have time to check out the back toward the lake but appeared to be a nice play area for kids, etc. the pool was being repainted, resurfaced at the time we were there, it was closed. Being that this motel sits east approximately 4 miles east of the WDW entrance, it does not appear that it is ever over crowded. It’s location is great because it sits across the street from Publix, a supermarket, not necessarily one that’s good on savings and just 2 miles north on Rt. 535, Vineland Rd, is Walmart. Overall it was quiet and I was satisfied. If you going to the amusement parks all day and just need a place to sleep and swim - I would recommend. I would equate this with a Holiday Inn as was stated in an earlier review, it is utilitarian. If you wanted a bit more luxury, were on a honeymoon of sorts, wanted romance, I’d go elsewhere. Come and enjoy. We left from here, 5 days and 4 nights, and went to the beach in Ft. Myers . . . ahhhhhhh!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and pleasant”
Reviews.Author: bertasone
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights the bed was clean comfy and soft. The staff is very nice. The Guy on the lake with the jet ski was a pleasant man very knowledgeable if you plan on jet sling they're not open on Sundays. Our room was large kinda dark the only thing bad I could say about the room was the TV its kinda high on the wall and its quite small but all n all I will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value with hidden charms”
Reviews.Author: HappyCamperLesley
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel on the strength of the reviews and the value, and I'm glad we did. We only stayed one night and were expecting very basic standards, but we were pleasantly surprised. The rooms were spacious, very clean and had fridges and microwaves (very much the same as the more expensive Holiday Inn), there was a pool and although it was on a busy road, the rooms were very quiet. A lovely benefit was the lake at the back of the hotel with a pier, a small beach, jetskis and a bbq area. In fact we got fish and chips from across the road (next to a Publix) and ate them whilst watching the sunset over the lake. This is a great hotel and we could easily have stayed several more nights.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful place!”
Reviews.Author: hydrangiss
Reviews.Content: fantastic value! close to attractions, flexible check-in/out times, friendly & helpful staff, nice pool, although a little outmoded the rooms are clean and well-maintained, free wireless internet, plenty of hot water and good water pressure. my family and i almost always stay at the golden link when we are in kissimmee/orlando =)

Reviews.Title: “Great for the price.”
Reviews.Author: SteveS1
Reviews.Content: We needed a place to stay for a couple of days after checking out of a time share. The kids had to be at the airport at 11 am so we had to check out early. We were able to check in and drop off our luggage at the Golden Link at 9 am. The room was comfortable, clean and reasonable at $39.

Reviews.Title: “Quirky Little Retro Motel”
Reviews.Author: hardtack_n_lace
Reviews.Content: First of all, this is not a fancy motel, but it was a quirky little place to spend the night. Due to a rainy day my family and I added one extra day to our Disney trip so we needed a room for one more night. We were really tired of the place we were staying at so we got a couple of rooms here. My teens loved the fact that the motel had real old fashioned keys and looked just like something out of the tv show Supernatural. If you are familiar with the show, you know that the two main characters spend a lot of time checking into motel rooms that time forgot. The rooms were big and had microwaves and fridges. The tv was okay, the wifi worked fine (and unlike Disney was FREE). The bath only had a shower and it was an old style tile one, but looked clean. The mattresses on the beds had seen better days and the linens looked like they had been washed a lot, but everything was clean. The price was good and check out and check in were quick. Yes, I would recommend a stay here--if you enjoy a little personality with your room.

Reviews.Title: “Golden Link is a delight”
Reviews.Author: KOngy78
Reviews.Content: The reviews that we read on-line were accurate. The room was spacious, clean, lots of hot water and water pressure. The front desk staff was courteous, friendly and helpful. In the morning we admired the view of the lake. It is also across the roadway from a major supermarket and many restaurants so you can eat-in or eat-out. Excellent value for the price. Shelli and Paul

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: EoCM
Reviews.Content: We always stay at The Golden Link Motel when we are in the Orlando/Kissimmee area. This place is a very nice and friedly place to stay at, Monica and all of her staff are very helpful and make you feel at home, no one mentioned and no one forgotten. Golden Link has a perfect location, close to all the major theme-parks, lot's of restaurant's within walking distance, lot's of great shopping nearby ... etc. The rooms are always clean and well maintained and we have been coming back almost every year to this place since 1992 and we will continue staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Great friendly place”
Reviews.Author: Traveledfar_11
Reviews.Content: An independent motel which is much cleaner and friendlier as the chain motels we stayed in. In fact it is a great and super clean place with friendly and happy staff. Large enough room for us four with all and more amenities we expect in this price range.The friendliness you receive here makes it a place worth staying.

Reviews.Title: “OK”
Reviews.Author: racechick8293
Reviews.Content: I have mixed feelings about the Golden LInk Motel. Overall, it was a positive experience, but the abundance of hotels/motels at reasonable prices in the area make me wonder whether it was really worth the $42/night I paid for the room here. Positives: clean room, free wi-fi, fridge and microwave in room, location close to Publix, Walmart, and Disney. Negatives: outdated decor, lighting in room felt inadequate, one very hard bed, and extremely small TV that was impossible to view from one of the beds.

Reviews.Title: “Wow great hotel great value”
Reviews.Author: Flyingeagle777
Reviews.Content: I travel often for pleasure and business and this is one of the best hotels ever. The staff goes above and beyond. The rooms are clean and comfortable. If your looking for an affordable hotel near Disney where you can be comfortable and feel safe this is it. Great location. This hotel has it all. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Value!”
Reviews.Author: welltravelledLisburn
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 8 nights (end Sept/Oct) with partner and 9 year old child. Motel is in a great location, very handy for all the theme parks and multiple eating places. Rooms are very clean, well equipped for a motel and staff very friendly and helpful. Breakfast is basic, coffee and pastries, but it's a motel not The Four Seasons! For what we paid we were more than happy and if returning to area would certainly stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Charming”
Reviews.Author: corgiflatmate
Reviews.Content: We didn't have a reservation, we just stopped right in and the precious British lady up front gave us a room. Had a fridge, a few tables and chairs. Breakfast isn't much more than Debbie's food cakes. Despite being right off of a major road, it was relatively quiet. It's right on a lake, in the middle of Kissimmee. It reminded me very much of a hotel that a church camp might go to, seeing how they had jetski rentals and such. I would definitely recommend to anyone. Very affordable. Excellent value for the cost!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and good value”
Reviews.Author: ChesterHagerstown_MD
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for four days in middle of June 2010. Had two adjoining rooms, Rooms were very clean and service was excellent. Price was good. Would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Best pillows I've ever had in a hotel”
Reviews.Author: ampanmangal
Reviews.Content: We decided to try someplace new for our Disney/Universal trip. Based on reviews we chose Golden Link. It is my new recommend for a budget hotel in the Kissimmee area. Yes it is an older budget motel. However compared to other similar hotels it was a step up. The towels are a bit larger and the pillows are better than any hotel pillow I've had - even luxury hotels. Everything was clean, room, bathroom, and pool. It has a stoplight to get you out of the parking lot. Staff was very friendly. The 'continental' breakfast is more like a snack. It has vending machine type items and coffee. There is a Publix grocery store across the street where we got our breakfast instead. With the micro and fridge it worked.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value in Kissimmee!”
Reviews.Author: M0m_in_Fla
Reviews.Content: I am a frequent visitor to Kissimmee and have tried many of the hotels along the "tourist strip." This was my first stay and I was very pleased. I've never been given two keys and asked to go pick the best room . . . before I'd even paid! The hotel was very clean, the staff was super friendly, and the swimming pool clean and refreshing. I'll make this my regular hotel from now on!

Reviews.Title: “a super motel”
Reviews.Author: gghager
Reviews.Content: this was the best hotel we have visited in the last two years in kiss. we go there 2 or 3 times a year for a get away this year we found golden link the staff was very helpful and so kind the outside was very ouiet i think the rooms were sound proof i think we have found a favorite and will stay there again . Thank you hope to see you again George & Wilnora Hager. Okeechobee , fla.

Reviews.Title: “We will definately go back”
Reviews.Author: travelingkennedys09
Reviews.Content: We stayed here while we were on our honeymoon for a whole week. The rooms were very inexpensive and we easily booked them thru their email on their website. We had no trouble checking in, and they even acknowledged we were on our honeymoon, which was so sweet. Our room was very comfortable and spacious. Towels were always replinished, bed was always made up, staff was very helpful and friendly, and we had no trouble sleeping at night. We didn't try the pool since we were gone most of the day, the breakfast consisted of coffee, orange juice, and some snack cakes, but with the money you save staying at this place, you can afford to go out. The location is perfect, we didn't eat at the same restaurant twice the whole week were were there because there were so many close ones nearby, and the hotel is right at the stoplight so it doesn't take forever to get out. I loved this place and recommended it to my family for when they go to Orlando, since it's so close to the parks. They will definately see us again!

Reviews.Title: “Clean motel with friendly staff and good location”
Reviews.Author: stclow
Reviews.Content: Motel was well priced, clean and a 20 minute drive to disney and less to outlet shopping. Easy to get to off interstate. Staff was very friendly during our stay. What the call the breakfast is really just coffee and packaged sugar cakes, look elsewhere for a decent breakfast. Lake is nice to have on back, grad a jetski or paddle boat and have some fun. Would stay here again, great headquarters for Disney/Universal/Shopping trip.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, good value, decent sized rooms. Don't take a room at the front.”
Reviews.Author: ssmithereens
Reviews.Content: The rooms are a decent size. Service was friendly. Price seemed very reasonable. The rooms are older, but were roomy and clean. Our room was skimpy on pillows, which made it hard to watch TV or do much other than lie down flat in the beds. The mattress on the provided cot was old and stained but serviceable. We had a room at the front of the building adjacent to the road. It was very noisy at night. Important to take a room at the back of the building away from the road if you stay here. Pool was very warm and clean, but unfortunately is at the front of the hotel, so it also suffers from the road noise. The area at the back near the lake is presently under construction. The `continental breakfast`` was a bit of a joke. Coffee and orange juice were offered, but only the food offered consisted of tiny little pre-packaged cakes in a basket. Save the disappointment and run across the street to the Publix and grab some breakfast items.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly atmosphere!”
Reviews.Author: DK_Chili
Reviews.Content: This was our first stay at Golden Link Motel - we'd booked ahead and had no problems what so ever when checking in. We got room 210 an upstairs room with a king bed as we had requested. The room was very clean and it seemed that the carpet had been put in recently. The shower was on the smaller side but it had a good shower with good pressure so I was happy. We had some problems connecting to the free wifi - we went to the front desk withh this and the were on the case right away. After they did their thing we still couldn't connect but their maintanence guy Greg really did a great job helping us out. He sat down with us in 3-4 different rooms to see where the connection where strongest (after resetting the router several times). Turns out our labtop was the problem - but we were very pleased with all the help we got in order to try to solve our problem. Thank you so much. I'd also like to add how friendly everybody was - everytime you walked into the lobby you were greated as if you were an old friend - and if you met someone from the staff somewhere on the property you always got a smile and a hello. We decided to check out a day earlier then planned since we couldn't do the things we had planned because of the rain and got an oppertunity to go downstate in stead. This didn't give us any problems either. So if you're looking for a place cheap (we paid 49.95 + tax er night) to stay when visiting the Kissimmee/Orlando/Disney area I would highly recommend going here.

Reviews.Title: “Great for the Price”
Reviews.Author: NC55
Reviews.Content: Read the reviews and didn't really know what to expect other than a great price. Upon arriving we entered the room and found it clean and free of odors. The refrigerator needed a little refreshing....a call to the front desk sent housekeeping immediately. The shower had plenty of hot water with some sort of misting effect. I think the shower head was missing but no biggie, it worked fine. I am cautious of bed bugs and checked all the mattresses and didn't see any signs of them. The room was large with a couch and could easily accommodate two adults and two teenagers with a cot. The hotel is older and the service was great. They overcharged my credit card but when I brought it to their attention, it was corrected immediately. The breakfast was simple; however we found many restaurants that met our needs close by. The kids loved hanging out at the dock. We stayed 4 days and would stay again. It isn't luxury by any means but for the price, it's great!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice! Clean, roomy and as close as you can get to Disney without being there.”
Reviews.Author: rustlor
Reviews.Content: We stumbled upon this place on a Friday evening. The price was wonderful! We didn't know what to expect. When we walked into room 103 we we pleasantly surprised. The place was clean (the tub and bathroom floors were even clean in the corners) and roomy. There was a fridge and microwave and plenty of space to put things out on the vanity and dressers. WIFI was awesome. I called at 3 in the morning because the WIFI was down and the attendant had someone get to it right away. We stayed with friends in Disney at Old Key West earlier in the week and they didn't offer WIFI. They had a cable that meant only one person at a time could get on. There were 6 of us with computers and itouchs - didn't work so hot. They have a dock and water right behind the motel. The jet skis and other water toys were not available but it looked like fun when the weather got warmer. And they have a pool in the front. Give this one a chance. We were so delighted with the stay we went back again a week later. The shower head in that room wasn't as nice (205). But, otherwise it was super. Planning a trip in August and we will be staying there again. Will be able to take advantages of the water then. Thanks for a great stay Golden Link Motel.

Reviews.Title: “Home”
Reviews.Author: Meeferblack
Reviews.Content: Been going for 25 years Found it by chance but it was the best for all our needs got married in kississmee 03-03-03 were having so much fun @ Golden Link Ken & Jen G

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Travlinda
Reviews.Content: We just spent 8 days here and found it to be economical and very nice. The location is perfect for access to the theme parks as well as restuarants and a grocery store. We bought some basics there so we could grab a quick breakfast in our room (so nice to have a fridge and microwave). The proximity to the grill and the lake would have been perfect had the weather cooperated. The staff was more than pleasant and accomodating. We look forward to our return.

Reviews.Title: “Took a chance and glad we did”
Reviews.Author: disneymom2010
Reviews.Content: We took a holiday trip to Disney and for the first time, did not stay on property. I was very nervous about booking a week long stay with a place I had never heard of but the reviews from past visitors were so good I decided to take a chance. It was our very good fortune to have been able to stay at The Golden Link. The room was very clean, no smell what so ever ( I only mention that because it is an older facility), AC and Heater worked great (we had to use both) the water pressure was perfect and we never were without hot water. There was plenty of storage and space in general. We were a very short distance to the parks and there was every restaurant and shopping venue you could want all around us. Most importantly, the staff were some of the nicest people you will ever meet. We will definitely stay here again and I already HAVE recommended it to others. No, it is not a "Luxury Hotel" but it is a fantastic bargin for anyone who wants a clean, safe, convenient and friendly place to stay a few days. Just a note: For those who call and speak with Shelia....she is as wonderful in person as on the phone:)

Reviews.Title: “The Worst Lodging experience ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: joeytravel29
Reviews.Content: The Worst Lodging experience ever!! 1. The room is not clean. We found an eye patch by the bed. Apparently, the room service even didn't see it. 2. There are insects in the room. 3. The sheets are stained, and seems like being used forever. 4. The so called "continental breakfast" is just a pot of coffee and several cookies. 5. Shampoo and soaps are very cheap. 6. Bath temperature is time dependant, and may deviate from freezing to very hot. 7. Wifi is not stable either, and can not be connected at all some times. I followed trip advisor before and had pretty good experience. But this time, I am extremely disappointed by the reviews here. I don't know how they manage to get so great ratings here. But this motel really does not deserve the top 10 lodging in Kissimmee area. If you want to have unhappy experience when visiting Orlando, you may find living here very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing to write home about, but worked well enough for us!”
Reviews.Author: Arl09
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for four nights. When we first arrived the front desk was very friendly and helpful. The location worked well for us, right at an intersection and not too far from family members staying just down the street. Biggest downside was that it was at times somewhat noisy (or maybe the windows/doors are thin?) and that it really is just a roadside motel. The shower, while sufficient, also left something to be desired (reminded me of an old gym locker room shower), and the room was somewhat dimly lit. But, considering the price we paid, we were satisfied with it and had no concerns, though in the future we may be inclined to spend more money to stay somewhere a little nicer.

Reviews.Title: “Nice price, bad service!”
Reviews.Author: juanvazquez
Reviews.Content: Good in price compared to others nearby, buy service from manager is so poor, no clean up in room service.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: echo92
Reviews.Content: The price was reasonable, the room was older but comfortable. The front desk was very friendly and helpful. A great place for working class people.

Reviews.Title: “very clean, tidy, friendly, good value”
Reviews.Author: realreveiws
Reviews.Content: very handy, good value, clean and friendly willing to help customers anytime. easy to find and lake and boardway on rear lawn. i will use and recommend this motel to all travellers looking for the best value in Orlando Area.

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for a place to stay in Orlando/Kissimmee area you don´t have to look any further.”
Reviews.Author: EoCM
Reviews.Content: This is the Place! Once again a pleasant stay at Golden Link This nice Motel is the perfect place to stay when you are visiting Orlando/Kissimmee. Close to all Theme Parks, lots of shopping and many restaurants. The atmosphere is fantastic at this Motel. Wonderful staff and great guests. Monica and her staff is very hospitable . If you need anything you get the help right away. Spacious and always clean and fresh rooms. The pool has a warm and comfortable temperature around 90 degrees I guess. We will definitely be back next year again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice, Clean Motel”
Reviews.Author: Bevzvet
Reviews.Content: We arrived at 10am on Oct 24th, 2009 after driving all night from New Jersey, to find they were happy to accomodate us. Check in was quick and we received a room on the second floor. As in all the other reviews, the room was clean and quiet with lots of storage. The bathroom was clean with only a shower, but it had plenty of hot water with good pressure. The air conditioner cooled the room quickly. For $39 a night this is a great stay for 1 night or a week. Close to restaurants and shopping, we would visit again.

Reviews.Title: “Your number 1 stop in Kissimmee....don't miss this one”
Reviews.Author: dai44
Reviews.Content: JUST BACK FROM OUR 6th STAY IN THIS GREAT ACCOMODATION IN KISSIMEE. Always love the realy helpful and friendly staff including MONICA,SHEILA and JULIE. .Thanks to you all for making our time with you so enjoyable yet again. We loved the heated pool and fishing from the dock on your lake...... so cool and relaxing after a long full FLORIDIAN day The GOLDEN LINK is PURE GOLD in a great location really handy for all the attractions. restaurants and stores. We will always stay here....its like home from home. Check it out FIRST......you wont look any further. Highway 192....marker 11.... 0pposite SR 535. junction. .

Reviews.Title: “Great basic hotel with all the key amenities”
Reviews.Author: Ok2bclever
Reviews.Content: I just completed a three day stay at the Golden Link and it was an excellent buy. Low price, friendly american family staff, just a few miles off I-4 right at a light so easy in/out access on what can be a very busy road (Irlo Bronson Hwy). Rooms are clean, in good shape, equipped with fridge and microwave and free wireless internet. Nice beds, vanity outside the bathroom which my wife loves even though I was solo this time. Shower had good pressure and as hot as you can take which is something I love. Nice heated pool out front and a nice beach and lake in the rear. They have a free basic continental breakfast, but as I never took advantage of it (slept in) I cannot comment on it. Great bang for the buck and I will be back the next time I am in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Our most LOVED place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Smithscotland
Reviews.Content: Excellent original family owned Motel which is safe, exceptionally clean rooms and beds and a very warm and friendly atmosphere. Nothing is a problem no matter how big or small with an excellent heated pool with towels provided and beautiful beach on private Lake Cecile with picnic area, fishing from the pier, not forgetting barbecue facility. Have spent many happy holidays here by our 2 selves also with friends from Ireland and hope to spend many more, even late arrivals are well catered for. Only minutes from all attractions and excellent shopping and eating facilities on doorstep . In all a very central place to stay and would not consider staying anywhere else. Have stayed in many Hotels and Country Clubs in Florida over the past 20 years but you do not get the same personal service and friendly atmosphere as the Golden Link staff give you. To sum up our holidays here excellent and really couldn't ask for more.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and location, clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: BigBri88
Reviews.Content: For value and location, can't be beat. Stayed there 5th time and will go back always. Clean friendly private owned and has all the comforts of home. Quiet and price is right. 10 min to Disney. Why spend $$$ at a Hilton. Enjoy the parks and return to the best kept secret in Kissimmee, Golden Link. So close to all and best value, really, comming from a past motel owner myself I know the best and reasonable ways to travel You can't go wrong at Golden Link!!!!!! Brian

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: RichBC
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have been staying in the Kissimmee area at least once a year for the last 18 years and I believe that this is one of the best in the area. Especially if you are looking for a clean, quiet, safe motel reasonably priced and close to everything. The staff, theres none better.

Reviews.Title: “Jim&Sandra Hamilton Ontario”
Reviews.Author: oldbag696
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Golden Link for over seventeen years, the oweners and all the staff always make you welcome. The rooms, heated pool and grounds are well maintained. It's a pleasure to stay there.

Reviews.Title: “a great holiday experience”
Reviews.Author: bazinflorida
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Golden Link 6 times now since 1994, basically every time we go to Forida. Found the motel simply by chance and would not consider staying anywhere else. The staff are great (especially shelia from wales) and the services and utilities are second to none. It is so good to return to a place where the staff remember you and go out of there way to make our stay enjoyable. The pool is heated and lit and is so enjoyable after a day at the parks and something to really look forward too. Highway 192 next to the motel has undergone an immense change since we first started visiting here and now has pedestrian walkways and crossing points to loads of resturants and shops. Have just booked flights and car hire again for easter 2010 and of course a room at the Golden Link. It will be good to meet the staff again and nice to to know that a warm welcome awaits us. All i can say is forget booking a hotel package to Orlando, all you need is a flight, car hire and directions to the best kept secret in Kissimmee.... the Golden Link Motel. bsynnott@hotmail.co.uk

Reviews.Title: “Clean, reasonable accomodations, well run !”
Reviews.Author: Ranger74
Reviews.Content: Never have been dissappointed. Rooms well above average for thje price, always clean and friendly personnel. What more could you ask for? Ranger Bob

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly family owned, basic good value.”
Reviews.Author: a_traveler_too
Reviews.Content: Great if you just need a clean inexpensive place to stay. Had microwave and refrigerator (bring your own utensils, cups etc). Laundry ($1.50 each for wash and dry) available. Check out the lawn on the lake behind the motel for quiet contrast to the strip of food and shops along the highway. Suggest if you are arriving late on hot day that you call ahead and ask them to turn on the air conditioning. It took over an hour for the room to cool to comfortable level for sleeping after we arrived. "Breakfast" is coffee and small cellophane wrapped pastry which was fine since we prefer to provide our own. The front desk lent me an electric pot to heat water for tea.

Reviews.Title: “BEST MOTEL IN ORLANDO/KISSIMMEE”
Reviews.Author: mbewshermoore
Reviews.Content: It s been 8 years since i ve been to florida, But my memories of the Golden link are still fresh in my mind of being friendly,warm,clean and safe. I stayed there on a number of times over a period of 11 years. Well what can i say about the staff friendly,always there if you need any help and advice. My parents still stay there at least twice a year and in their opinon its home from home. The rooms are great especaily room 110 with the biggest bed ever(mum says she gets the best nights sleeps there). Great location, can shop till i drop with it being close to everything. Well done to all the staff keep up the good work. Jackie and steve will see you all in 2 weeks

Reviews.Title: “Fine for sleeping while visiting Disney and other attractions”
Reviews.Author: LuckyMomNewJersey
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at the Golden LInk with husband and 2 small children while on an impromptu trip to Disney. Stayed 5 nights. Had no trouble with a somewhat late arrival. Room was as described. Will rethink a bathroom with shower only with small children, but we made due. Room was clean. Bathroom could use some updating, but was clean. Everything worked as it should - A/C, mircowave, fridge, in-room safe. Pool was nice. Well maintained. Nice break from the hectic pace of the parks. Convenient location to Disney World, about 15 minute drive. Publix grocery store across the street and very near to all chain restaurants. Continental breakfast is no more than coffee, OJ and cellophane-packaged powdered doughnuts and crumb cake. But I guess in a pinch it would work. Staff was friendly and helpful. No real issues. It does sit on a lake and they do have a pier and BBQ pit, but it's nothing fancy. Our main focus was to spend 4 days in the 4 Disney parks and we did just that. For roughly $43 a night, I feel it was an acceptable room and provided exactly what we needed - a clean, safe place to sleep that was near to Disney. I would stay here again if budget does not allow us to stay at one of the value resorts at Disney (they were booked full for when we were traveling). Some suggestions for management: 1) put boxspring covers on the boxsprings. The ones in our room were visibly stained and in poor condition. A removable, washable cover would make the beds look in better condition, 2) put queen-sized blankets on the queen-sized beds, not the full-sized blankets that are on there, at least that was the case in our room. Plus they were paper thin and not very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Great little place for a family on a budget”
Reviews.Author: 2_traveling_kids_Mom
Reviews.Content: Mom of a family of 4 from Michigan This is a nice little hotel. The staff was really helpful and friendly. One morning my daughter thought it would be funny to put out the "clean room now" sign. Within 10 min the Maid was there asking what she could do for us. The location was great!! Easy access to Disney World and International Drive. This is right at the End of Road 535 that takes you to 536. (Epcot Dr) Go left (on 536) to Disney Parks go right to International drive. The rooms were clean and neat. NO bugs!! They had Micro, Fridge, and a small table and 2 chairs my kids were able to eat at. Double beds were a bit small, but did give you more room to move around. Pool was basic but nice, and it was heated 88deg. Much nicer then a lot of more expensive places I have stayed. I loved being able to do our laundry right there. We stayed 10 days and had to do laundry twice. I even did it one night at 11:30 and never felt unsafe. The only negative things were minor. - The "Continental Breakfast" was coffee, watered down juice and some nasty rolls. (but really what do you expect for $40 a night) You are better off to head to the grocery store across the street and get milk and cereal. Also, the rooms used real keys, I prefer the electronic locks that can be changed. But with the maintenance guy always around I never felt the least bit unsafe. All and all the Positives far outweigh the negatives. We will plan to stay here next time we go down to Disney.

Reviews.Title: “Where are the maids?”
Reviews.Author: try2hunymoon
Reviews.Content: Everyone we were in contact with in the front desk have been extremely friendly. The carpets seem relatively new. The bed also seemed fairly new, but the box spring was not. They have a mattress pad on the bed, that was full of stains, the mattress pad was topped by a flat sheet, and then another flat sheet, and then a bedspread. As most people know, even fitted sheets have a tendency to loosen and come off a bed, but a flat sheet as the bottom sheet, is even worse. It probably wouldn't have been so bad if the mattress pad wasn't so disgustingly stained. The pillows were terrible. The word, "pancake," comes to mind. The remote for the TV doesn't work very well. You have to hold your tongue and the button just right to change the volume or the channel. We have three days worth of garbage built up here because we have NOT seen a MAID since we checked in. I guess that is why they offer a three day special rate? They only send in the maids after you have checked out? Too bad. They missed out a several dollars tip that was sitting here waiting for them. We won't be tipping upon check out. Our bathroom smells of body odor. Yuck! I went to Wal-Mart today and bought an air freshener to hang inside. There is only a shower in the room, not a bathtub. The air conditioner works well. I have not seen any bugs, which is important to me. The location is extremely convenient to so many things, especially if you have a car. I have no idea how the public transportation is. There was a car parked outside that had a dented in front windshield. It almost looked as though something was thrown off the top floor, landing on the car's windshield and splintering it. As a result, I parked on the back row so I wouldn't be parked right under the top floor. Everyone else followed suit after I set the stage, including the car with the damaged windshield. The supplies are very sparse. There was 2 bars of soap, and 2 shampoo, and ice bucket and some plastic cups, but no hair dryer, or coffee maker. There is a microwave and mini-fridge. It was quiet, and didn't really see and unsavory types around. The door to the room was full of grungy, dirty fingerprints. Both my husband and I tried to wipe it down, and get rid of them. The bathroom door was old and dark, so for all I know, it is dirty and grungy too. If we had maid service today like we were promised, and actually got a fitted sheet on our bed, I would've considered staying here again, since we will be back in a few days, but no maid service is not acceptable. So we won't be staying here next week, or ever again.

Reviews.Title: “fantastic friendly place”
Reviews.Author: Robmcfc
Reviews.Content: I cannot understand anybody having a problem with the goldenlink.MY wife and i have been to florida every year for the past nine years and as always we spend three or four days here and have never had a problem. The staff especially sheila will go way out of there way to help you and always with a smile.Sheila even came back one evening and brought us a wedding present.This is the friendliest motel in floridaThe rooms are very clean and bug free we used the BBQ , Fished the lake,jet skied,Dined out and had a great time.Chuck the links maintanance man is always there to give good advice and a helping hand should you need it. Rob n Karen Manchester Eng.

Reviews.Title: “One of our Favorites”
Reviews.Author: SuzyQ1256
Reviews.Content: First stayed at the Golden Link in 1991 and have been back every other year since. There is always a warm welcome and it is really nice when you walk into reception to register and they remember you from previous years. Have always found the rooms and pool area to be very clean and kept tidy. The staff are helpful in all situations whether it be more clean towels or the address of the nearest medical centre. Sheila is a definate treasure. We look forward to seeing her again this October at the start of another great holiday. Suzy Q Dunstable Bedfordshire England

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Motel”
Reviews.Author: Nepean03
Reviews.Content: We arrived in Orlando two days early for our reservation at another property. Unfortunately, they did not have any rooms available. I was aware of the Golden Link and walked in. They immediately offered to let me look at the room. The front desk staff, especially Sheila, were very friendly and accomodating. We were in room 429 and it was immaculate. This is an older property but has been recently renovated. The carpet, beds and furniture were relatively new. The sheets were new and of good quality. There is excellent security and we felt very safe. The pool was clean and warm. Even though the pool is at the front of the property we enjoyed watching the traffic and activity. You cannot be seen easily from the road. There are many restaurants within walking distance. This property is family owned and operated by the original owners and it is obvious that they take great pride in their motel. I would happily staff there again. The rate was reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional value for the Price”
Reviews.Author: TimM7768
Reviews.Content: My wife and I spent 10 days here in September 2007 and found the Motel to be excellent all round. We stayed in a 'smoking room' but there was NO stale smoke smell and we didnt smoke in there either. A newly decorated room with a huge walk in shower along with new fixtures and fittings in the main room, inclusive of a very comfortable bed/settee. All very pleasing in particular the huge kingsize bed. There has been a change of staff since our previous visits and yet we found 'all' the new people to be just as capable and knowledgeable as those we encountered on previous stays. We liked the idea of 'no bar' which seemed to keep the 'drinking tourists away', though we did enjoy the odd six pack around the sumptious pool. All in all we would both highly reccomend this Motel to anyone who doesn't want the Hustle and Bustle of International Drive, preferring the quiet of Kissimmee and yet the closeness of all the Parks and superb Shopping and Eateries.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here unless you provide all your personal info”
Reviews.Author: lou7337
Reviews.Content: I was a walk in. Upon check in, I advised them it would be for two people. I was alone at check in as my guest was coming in behind me. When my guest arrived to the room, someone from the hotel stopped my guest to question who they were, what they were doing there. I received a phone call asking me if I was waiting for a guest in a certain car. My guest would not answer any of their questions and was told to leave. When I came out of my room to find out what was going on, the hotel person interrogating my guest told me with an attitude that they have problems in the hotel and my guest would not answer any of his questions. I told him it was not any of their business to question my guest. I did not stay at the here. Be prepared to be racially profiled.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Golden link Motel 100% customer service!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Golden link motel was Excellent 100% customer service all the staff was very very helpful. The room was comfortable clean excellent, best motel i ever stayed in the pass 10 years in kissimee orlando area!! I would recommend this hotel to anyone. Heated out door pool was excellent, nice beach to the rear end motel nice view, convenient to the acess main road did not had make u turns that was great just wait for the light. Price was excellent!!

HotelInfo.Name: Golden Link Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 4914 West Irlo Bronson HWY 192, Kissimmee, FL 34746
